name: Vic_Vankoh

attributes.name: Affiliation(s)
values: Vic Vankoh and the Bith Boys

content:
Vic Vankoh was a human male musician who once performed on the planet Scarif for an audience that included the Sith Lords Darth Sidious and Darth Vader.
Vic Vankoh's name was first revealed alongside the announcement of the animated special LEGO Star Wars Summer Vacation during the Summer of LEGO Star Wars panel at Star Wars Celebration Anaheim 2022. Vankoh later appeared in the trailer for the special, which released on June 21, 2022. The character was voiced by singer/comedian "Weird Al" Yankovic, who also performed a new song titled "Scarif Beach Party" for the film.
